text: Joseph Maher (December 29 1933 - July 17 1998) was an Irish-American movie, television, voice, and stage actor. He is best known from his acting in the television series Goode Behavior and the movies Heaven Can Wait, Mars Attacks and Sister Act. He played the character Mr. Chambers in 1984 short Frankenweenie. Maher won a Drama Desk Award in 1986. Maher was born in Westport, County Mayo, Ireland on December 29, 1933.Joseph Maher Biography (1933-1998) Maher was openly gay. He was a naturalized US citizen. Maher died on July 17, 1998 in Los Angeles, California from a brain tumor. He was 64 years old when he died. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Photo Category:1933 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish radio actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:LGBT actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Joseph Maher
